name: Yubel - Angle of Darkness
text:
1 "Yubel" monster except "Yubel - Angle of Darkness" + 1 "HERO" monster 
 If this card is Fusion Summoned: Monsters you currently control cannot be destroyed by card effects until the end of your next turn. (Quick Effect) You can shuffle 1 "Yubel" card from your GY into the Deck; then destroy 1 card on the field, and if you do, cards with that destroyed card's name cannot activate their effect for the rest of the turn. You can only use this effect of "Yubel - Angle of Darkness" once per turn.
